Evidence Controls

On-disk actions require Chrome/Edge/Brave (File System Access API). Fallback uses a directory picker that works on most OS/browser combos.

Evidence (Local Storage)

On‑Disk Evidence (Chosen/Fallback Folder)

Help — Run Locally

For best compatibility, serve this file from a local web server:
  • Windows: double‑click start_server.bat
  • macOS: right‑click start_server.command → Open
  • Any OS with Python 3: run python3 run_local_server.py
Then browse to the printed http://localhost:8000 URL.
